theory.brief: Ôn tập: (1) Reported Speech: thay đổi thì (present → past), đại từ, từ chỉ thời gian (today → that day). Said không cần tân ngữ, told + tân ngữ. (2) First Conditional: If + present simple, will + V. (3) may/might/could = có thể (khả năng). (4) have to = phải (bắt buộc từ bên ngoài).
examples: She said she was tired. / He told me he was busy.
If it rains, we will stay at home.
It might rain tomorrow. / She may be at home.
I have to go to school. / You don't have to pay.

exercises.question: She said she __________ tired.
exercises.explanation: Reported speech: is → was

exercises.question: If it rains tomorrow, we __________ stay at home.
exercises.explanation: First Conditional: If + present, will + V

exercises.question: It __________ rain tomorrow. Look at those dark clouds!
exercises.explanation: 'might' cho khả năng (có thể xảy ra)

exercises.question: I __________ to wear a uniform at school.
exercises.explanation: 'have to' cho sự bắt buộc từ bên ngoài

exercises.question: He told me he __________ busy.
exercises.explanation: Reported speech với 'told': thay đổi thì
hints: told + tân ngữ + mệnh đề (thì quá khứ)

exercises.question: If you __________ hard, you'll pass the exam.
exercises.explanation: First Conditional: If + present simple

exercises.question: She __________ be at home. I'm not sure.
exercises.explanation: 'may' cho khả năng không chắc chắn

exercises.question: You don't __________ to pay for the ticket. It's free.
exercises.explanation: don't have to = không cần phải
hints: don't have to = không bắt buộc

exercises.question: She said she __________ go to the party tomorrow.
exercises.explanation: Reported speech: will → would

exercises.question: If we __________ leave now, we'll miss the bus.
exercises.explanation: First Conditional phủ định: If + don't + V

exercises.question: He __________ be at the office. He sometimes works late.
exercises.explanation: 'could' cho khả năng có thể xảy ra

exercises.question: __________ I have to finish this today?
exercises.explanation: Câu hỏi với 'have to': Do/Does + subject + have to

exercises.question: He __________ me that he was leaving.
exercises.explanation: 'told' + tân ngữ (me)

exercises.question: She __________ that she liked the movie.
exercises.explanation: 'said' không cần tân ngữ

exercises.question: If you heat ice, it __________.
exercises.explanation: Zero Conditional cho sự thật hiển nhiên

exercises.question: Take an umbrella. It __________ rain later.
exercises.explanation: 'might' cho khả năng

exercises.question: She __________ to work on Saturdays.
exercises.explanation: has to = phải (ngôi 3 số ít)

exercises.question: He said he __________ me the next day.
exercises.explanation: will → would; tomorrow → the next day

exercises.question: If you __________ too much sugar, you'll get sick.
exercises.explanation: First Conditional: If + present simple

exercises.question: Where's John? He __________ be in the library.
exercises.explanation: 'may' cho phỏng đoán không chắc chắn

exercises.question: She said she __________ (be) very happy.
If it __________ (rain), we'll stay inside.
hints: If + present simple (ngôi 3 số ít thêm -s)

exercises.question: She __________ (might) be at the party. I'm not sure.
I __________ (have) to finish my homework before dinner.
He told me he __________ (can) help me.

exercises.question: She said she __________ (live) in London.

exercises.correctSentence: She said she was tired.

exercises.correctSentence: She may be at home.
exercises.explanation: Modal verbs không thêm -s

exercises.wrongSentence: He said me that he was busy.

exercises.wrongSentence: She mights come to the party.
exercises.correctSentence: She might come to the party.

exercises.wrongSentence: She have to work on Sundays.
exercises.correctSentence: She has to work on Sundays.

exercises.question: She said she __________ going to the cinema.

exercises.question: He __________ be sleeping. It's very late.

exercises.question: If she __________ the train, she'll be late.

exercises.question: You __________ be right. I'm not sure.

exercises.question: He said he __________ there before.
exercises.explanation: has been → had been trong reported speech

exercises.question: What will you do if it __________?
exercises.explanation: If + present simple (ngôi 3 số ít thêm -s)
